item.title: The Peloton API Part 2: A Valentine Peloton Tribute to my Wife
item.description: Peloton R In part 1 of my Peloton API post, I explored the pelotonR package created by Ben Weiher’s. Its a great package for accessing your Peloton data and I recommend it. In part 2, I’ll explore a different Peloton package from Laura Ellis. She provides a great tutorial to display the functionality. Objectives The objectives for this post is to… Show how awesome my wife is. Highlight a second package.

item.title: The Peloton API Part 1: Accessing and Exploring
item.description: In 2018, my wife and I were fortunate enough to find a deeply discounted Peloton on an online garage sale. Since then, she’s been going hard and I have been trying to keep up when the weather is bad or injuries keep me from running. Jill Smiling After Her 600th Ride (and new record)! Over the last few months, a few works projects have taught me a lot about purrr, functional programming, collaborative projects, and APIs.
